name: Yoga Bear (browser edition)
description:
This is the browser edition for the game. Music and images have been compressed. You can find the original game here (for PC/Mac).

What happens when a struggling artist falls in love with a complete stranger? 🌈✨

A short visual novel for NanoReno 2021.

Contains anxiety and mature language.

Comments are appreciated and Let's Plays are welcome!
